content: Set up project structure and package.json for Node.js/Express backend
Create core Fishbowl API service with authentication and rate limiting
Build data models and TypeScript interfaces for all Fishbowl endpoints
Implement marketing KPI calculation engine with Klaviyo-comparable metrics
Create database schema and models for storing processed analytics
Build API endpoints for frontend dashboard consumption
Implement background job processing for data refresh with Redis/Bull
Add comprehensive error handling, logging, and monitoring
Create sample data transformations and test suite
